sources.title: Fighting Stock
sources.description: “Classic British comedy” (IMDB reviews quote). This bucolic adventure is another Ben Travers farce rich in wordplay costarring Tom Walls and Ralph Lynn supported by a worthy cast of regulars. IMDB rating 6.0. Directed by Tom Walls. Released in 1935 (UK only). Complete print.

metadata.Plot: On a fishing holiday, irascible Sir Donald Rowley (Walls) is soon at loggerheads with neighbour Rivers. Then nephew Sidney (Lynn) falls for Rivers' stepdaughter. All kinds of complications ensue.
metadata.Actors: Tom Walls, Ralph Lynn, Robertson Hare
